assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: DCW Limited operates as a heavy chemical manufacturing company in India. It operates through Soda Ash, Caustic Soda, PVC, SIOP, and C-PVC. The company's products include caustic soda, liquid chlorine, hydrochloric acid, synthetic rutile, trichloroethylene, synthetic and yellow iron oxide, red and yellow pigment, ferric chloride, utox, poly vinyl chloride, soda ash, and sodium and ammonium bicarbonate. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Dhrangadhra Chemical Works Limited. DCW Limited was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Dilip Vishnubhai Darji
companyOfficers.title: GM of Legal, Company Sec. & Compliance Officer

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Pramod Kumar Shriyans Prasad Jain
companyOfficers.title: Chairman & MD
